meaningMnemonic: What will <kanji>give birth</kanji> to <kanji>business</kanji>? Well, some kind of <vocabulary>industry</vocabulary>, probably. Though <vocabulary>heavy industry</vocabulary> is pretty good too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
